name: Dinugi Senavirathna
review: This comment is from Sri Lanka. actually, Harry Potter is another world. When I read or watch Harry Potter series I am in the wizardry world. My world is Harry Potter

name: Saniya K
review: Actually I am a big fan of Harry Potter I know not only me everyone tiny hearts are wandering for Harry. I am so thankful to JK Rowling to take me through the world of magic and wizardry you are imaginary is beyond everything. I know she will never see this comment but I just want to leave my feeling here in the shape of a comment. Truth is I love Harry Potteseries and JK love you so much. When I am reading your books that really makes me crazy.ü•∞

name: Riya
review: I think Harry Potter is the best fantasy story ever written . I am a mad fan of it .In today's generation mobile phone and other electronic devices were destroying many aspects of Childhood . But Harry Potter books made them back to reading . The book also shows that real friends are not less than our own brothers and sister. I think J.K. Rowling is an unforgettable contemporary icon .

name: Pranta
review: This comment is from Bangladesh. actually, Harry Potter is another world. When I read or watch Harry Potter series I am in the wizardry world. My world is Harry Potter
